layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (0,8) size 800x584 [bgcolor=#C0C0C0]
      LayoutTable (floating) {TABLE} at (0,0) size 800x30 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 798x28
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 798x24
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 794x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 22x19
                text run at (2,2) width 22: "text"
